1.name: Rebel Without a Cause
1.description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

2.name: To Catch a Thief
2.description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

3.name: The Night of the Hunter
3.description: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

4.name: Lady and the Tramp
4.description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

5.name: Land of the Pharaohs
5.description: A captured architect designs an ingenious plan to ensure the impregnability of tomb of a self-absorbed Pharaoh, obsessed with the security of his next life.

6.name: East of Eden
6.description: A wilful young man contends against his brother for the attention of their religious father while reconnecting with his estranged mother and falling for his brother's girlfriend.

7.name: Oklahoma!
7.description: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

8.name: Jupiter's Darling
8.description: Fabius loves his beautiful but vulnerable city, Rome, and he also loves his beautiful but invulnerable fiancée, Amytis. Fascinated by the tales she has heard about Hannibal, who is about to...                See full summary »

9.name: The Trouble with Harry
9.description: The trouble with Harry is that he's dead, and everyone seems to have a different idea of what should be done with his body.

10.name: Guys and Dolls
10.description: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

11.name: This Island Earth
11.description: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

12.name: The Seven Year Itch
12.description: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.

13.name: Les diaboliques
13.description: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal hatch a plan to murder him while having the perfect alibi. They carry out the plan...but then his body disappears.

14.name: Gojira no gyakushû
14.description: Godzilla battles an irradiated Ankylosaur and destroys Osaka in the process.

15.name: Hit the Deck
15.description: Sailor Danny Xavier Smith and two other gobs try to save his sister Susan's virtue. She wants to get a role in the show "Hit the Deck". After wrecking the producers hotel suite, they land ...                See full summary »

16.name: Killer's Kiss
16.description: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.

17.name: The Ladykillers
17.description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

18.name: Kiss Me Deadly
18.description: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

19.name: Pather Panchali
19.description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

20.name: Tarantula
20.description: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in giantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.

21.name: All That Heaven Allows
21.description: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

22.name: Summertime
22.description: A lonely American woman unexpectedly finds romance in Venice, Italy.

23.name: To Hell and Back
23.description: The true WWII story of Audie Murphy, the most decorated soldier in U.S. history. Based on the autobiography of Audie Murphy who stars as himself in the film.

24.name: Marty
24.description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

25.name: Du rififi chez les hommes
25.description: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

26.name: The Tall Men
26.description: Two brothers discharged from the Confederate Army join a businessman for a cattle drive from Texas to Montana where they run into raiding Jayhawkers, angry Sioux, rough terrain and bad weather.

27.name: Mister Roberts
27.description: In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.

28.name: The Court Jester
28.description: A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful king.

29.name: The Man with the Golden Arm
29.description: A strung-out junkie deals with a demoralizing drug addiction while his crippled wife and card sharks pull him down.

30.name: The Dam Busters
30.description: The story of how the British attacked German dams in World War II by using an ingenious technique to drop bombs where they would be most effective.

31.name: 5 Against the House
31.description: Four vets attending college on the GI Bill and a cabaret singer try to rob a Reno Casino and pull off the perfect crime.

32.name: Bad Day at Black Rock
32.description: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

33.name: A Lawless Street
33.description: A Marshal must face unpleasant facts about his past when he attempts to run a criminal gang out of town.

34.name: Stolen Assignment
34.description: A young female reporter, tired of the lightweight women's stories her editor keeps assigning her, pesters him to give her an assignment with more substance. When an artist's rich wife is ...                See full summary »

35.name: Revenge of the Creature
35.description: Men capture the Creature from the Black Lagoon (1954) and make him an aquarium attraction, from which he escapes.

36.name: Mr. Arkadin
36.description: An American adventurer investigates the past of the mysterious tycoon Gregory Arkadin (Orson Welles), placing himself in grave danger.

37.name: It's a Dog's Life
37.description: A bull terrier tells his life story, from the streets of the Bowery to a life of luxury.

38.name: Man with the Gun
38.description: When a notorious tough 'town tamer' is hired by the citizenry to rid of the gunmen driving them off their land, he finds the local saloon madam to be an old friend.

39.name: Ordet
39.description: Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.

40.name: Strategic Air Command
40.description: An ex-pilot and current baseballer is recalled into the U.S. Air Force and assumes an increasingly important role in Cold War deterrence.

41.name: Blackboard Jungle
41.description: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

42.name: The Kentuckian
42.description: A Kentucky widower bound for 1820's Texas with his young son is thwarted in his efforts by a corrupt constable, a long-standing family feud, and a beautiful indentured servant.

43.name: The Rose Tattoo
43.description: An Italian-American neighborhood in Louisiana is disturbed when truck driver Rosario Delle Rose is killed by police while smuggling. His buxom widow Serafina miscarries, then over a period ...                See full summary »

44.name: Bride of the Monster
44.description: A mad doctor attempts to create atomic supermen.

45.name: A Life at Stake
45.description: An out-of-work architect meets a married woman who has a business proposition for him. The architect begins to suspect the woman's interest in him is not just financial and may actually be deadly.

46.name: Richard III
46.description: Shakespeare's powerful tale of the wicked deformed King and his conquests, both on the battlefield and in the boudoir.

47.name: Blood Alley
47.description: His ship seized by the Chinese Communists, American Merchant Captain Tom Wilder languishes in prison but Chinese villagers help him escape to sail them to Hong-Kong.

48.name: We're No Angels
48.description: Three Devil's Island escapees hide out in the house of a kindly merchant and repay his kindness by helping him and his family out of several crises.

49.name: The Desperate Hours
49.description: Three escaped convicts move in on and terrorize a suburban household.

50.name: It Came from Beneath the Sea
50.description: A giant, radioactive octopus rises from the Philippine Trench to terrorize the North American Pacific Coast.
